wikipedia_page.main: Duncan Lambie (20 April 1952 – December 2015) was a Scottish footballer, who played for Dundee, St Johnstone, SpVgg. Fürth, and Hibernian.

response: *Duncan Lambie (1952–2015) - footballer for Dundee, St Johnstone, SpVgg. Fürth and Hibernian
